ally . You must continue to support Anlucia and fight with us. This is a mission that only you can

62204.<voice 01285_00062204><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01285_00062204><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Please tell me more about Divine
Crimsonite.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62205.<voice 01335_00062205><start_lip_sync n0:
Divine Crimsonite is said to be the keystone that protects the land of Lendersia, created by the human god
Gran Zenith with his own blood, from evil.

62206.<voice 01375_00062206><start_lip_sync n0:
The Scarlet Stone in that temple has been destroyed, but Divine Crimsonite says there are four in all in
Lendersia.

62207.<voice 01405_00062207><start_lip_sync n0:
Originally, the demon could not even be touched, but over its long history, its power has waned, and now it is all
it can do to protect Lendersia.

62209.<voice 01485_00062209><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01485_00062209><start_lip_sync n02207 _normal m00001>At long last, we have figured out how
to restore Divine Crimsonite's once
diminished power!<stop_lip_animation n02207 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62210.<voice 01525_00062210><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01525_00062210><start_lip_sync n02207 _normal m00001>It is to infuse Divine Crimsonite with
the power of your Hero!<stop_lip_animation n02207 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62211.<voice 01565_00062211><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01565_00062211><start_lip_sync n02207 _normal m00001>The scarlet stone will be instantly
revitalized, regain its divine power,
and will not be destroyed by anything!<stop_lip_animation n02207 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62212.<voice 01588_00062212><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01588_00062212><start_lip_sync n02207 _normal m00001>The reason is that it is written in
the tradition that the power of Hero
also comes from the god Gran Zenith!<stop_lip_animation n02207 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62213.<voice 01647_00062213><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01647_00062213><start_lip_sync n02207 _normal m00001>So I have a favor to ask of the hero
princess! Your body is very
